title: Which old hits songs are the best? - Quora

response.answer_text: Some of the old hit songs which are best forever are: 1. Duniya banane wale ( one of my most n most favourite song)2. kahin door jab din dhal jaye 3. shaam mastani 4.Chura liya hai tumne jo dil ko 5. Mere sapno ki raani 6. O saathi chal7.Tu jahan jahan chalega 8. Dil cheez kya aap meri 9.Lag ja gale  10.main tulsi tere aangan ki( i love this song) 11. O saathi re tere bina bhi kya jeena 12. tujhse naaraz nahi zindagi 13.Tere bina zindagi se koi shikwa to nahi 14.Ek raasta hai zindagi .......and for the best you can refer to the ghazal of jagjit singh '' The King of Ghazals one n only Jagjit singh"......these are the best old hit songs which I mentioned above....Thank you!!
